name: CQ.themes.wcm.Sidekick
doc: The theme-specific constants for CQ.wcm.Sidekick.This class is a singleton and cannot be created ...

props.name: HEIGHT
props.doc: <static> The height of the Sidekick in pixels (defaults to 406).

props.name: ICON_COMPONENT
props.doc:
<static> The default icon for components in the Sidekick (defaults to
"/libs/cq/ui/widgets/...

props.name: MIN_HEIGHT
props.doc: <static> The minimum height of the Sidekick in pixels (defaults to 406).

props.name: MIN_WIDTH
props.doc: <static> The minimum width of the Sidekick in pixels (defaults to 214).

props.name: RESIZABLE
props.doc:
<static> The value for resizable
(defaults to true).

props.name: RESIZE_HANDLES
props.doc:
<static> The value for resizeHandles
(defaults to "all"). Only applies if RESIZABLE is true.

props.name: WIDTH
props.doc: <static> The width of the Sidekick in pixels (defaults to 214).
